nodes.excerpt: With http://djaty.com/, anyone can professionally report. And no more bugs reproduction! Report includes: Screenshots Steps Clicks Logs Browser aspect Network state Background exceptions Machine aspect The line code caused the bug Integrations: Slack Jira Gitlab

nodes.excerpt: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
nodes.title: Avo for PMs - Error proof your analytics
nodes.author: Stefania Olafsdottir

nodes.excerpt: Around is a lightweight video collaboration tool that floats on your desktop, perfect for things like design sessions, brainstorms, and code reviews. Available for download. Now comes with EchoTerminator.
nodes.title: Around 2.0 - Video calls for the future of hybrid-remote work
nodes.author: Garry Tan

nodes.excerpt: A small app for making quick flowcharts from text â¿».
nodes.title: flowchart.fun - An open-source tool for generating flowcharts from text

nodes.excerpt: Repl.it Teams for Education is a real-time collaborative coding environment for teachers and students to write code in 50+ languages. Teachers can create curriculum, facilitate pair-coding groups, provide instant code feedback with annotations and autograding.
nodes.title: Repl.it Teams for Education - Zero-setup collaborative cloud IDE for teachers and students

nodes.excerpt: With this new Zapier plugin, Bubble apps can create both â€œtriggersâ€ or â€œactionsâ€ for a Zap. This lets you do everything from trigger workflows to add, delete, and modify things in your Bubble app database with any web service in Zapierâ€™s extensive library.
nodes.title: Official Bubble Zapier Integration - Connect any web service to a no-code web app.

nodes.excerpt: Find the perfect time across multiple time zones. We have our coworkers, family and friends distributed across the globe. Knowing what time overlaps can get tricky. We created Nomad Time to have a simple, fast and delightful experience.
nodes.title: Nomad Time - A friendly time zone converter
nodes.author: Rafael Chiti

nodes.excerpt: Zepel is the project management software that takes you beyond simple issue tracking. This way, you can plan features, track progress of your entire product development process, and ship customer-focussed software painlessly.
nodes.title: Zepel 2.0 - Jira alternative for software product teams
nodes.author: Vikash Koushik

nodes.excerpt: Meetcode tech interview helps companies to accelerate & scale hiring by integrating the need of face-to-face communication and key competencies evaluation, including library of 250+ questions, 20+programming languages and developersâ€™ preferred built-in IDE.
nodes.title: Meetcode - Find top developers effortlessly by online code interview

nodes.title: Snippy - Manage your snippets in Chrome
nodes.author: Ilyich Vismara

nodes.excerpt: This design tool helps developers to generate CSS of Soft UI / Neumorphism for the element with realtime output. This saves developers time on designing soft ui for their projects Checkout Toolbox : http://santhoshsivan.com/toolbox.html
nodes.title: Neumorphism CSS Generator - Soft UI CSS generator for front-end developers
nodes.author: Santhosh Sivan

nodes.excerpt: Global.health is a collaborative effort by technologists and researchers from leading international institutions to build a trusted, detailed, and accurate resource of real-time infectious disease data.
nodes.title: Global.health - Access data about 5M+ anonymized COVID-19 cases
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Save your online memories with Memento. Memento uses powerful APIs to automatically categorize and organize your URLs so it's easy to search for them later on. Request access now!
nodes.title: Memento - Automatically categorize and organize your URLs using ML
nodes.author: Andres Kim

nodes.excerpt: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) are cutting-edge websites that behave like native apps. They're installable, fast, work offline, and open in their own native window. Pep turns your existing website into a PWA in one line of code.
nodes.title: Pep - Turn your site into a fast, installable Progressive Web App
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: With code-ray you can fix bugs in your code faster and easier. You can set breakpoints to show the live state in different sections of your code. code-ray can be linked to GitHub, GitLab and Bitbucket. There is a permanently free version.
nodes.title: code-ray - Live debugging tool for software developers
nodes.author: Henry Burkert

nodes.title: Unfolded Studio - Explore a world of data with advanced geospatial analytics
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Octohook is a no-code web application that helps you visualize, debug and redistribute your webhooks via powerful workflows.
nodes.title: Octohook - Catch webhooks and send them through powerful workflows
nodes.author: Loris Leiva

nodes.excerpt: Want to deliver higher quality software cheaper and faster? Then Code Quality Guide is something you were looking for. It is a comprehensive and practical guide for those who want to improve the quality of code with the best techniques and strategies.
nodes.title: Complete Code Quality Guide - Learn everything you should know about code quality
nodes.author: Artem Galenko

nodes.excerpt: Verbz is a voice productivity app for teams. Create notes, assign tasks, make announcements, run stand-ups, or just chat. Talk or type, listen or read.
nodes.title: Verbz - Create tasks, notes, and chat, all with voice
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Design is a continually changing environment. Whatâ€™s cool one day, is old the next. So designers always have to be on their toes - itâ€™s a pretty hectic gig. And this is where Yizy comes into play!
nodes.title: Yizy - Give Meaning to your Screenshots and Bookmarks!
nodes.author: Eyobiel Andebrhan

nodes.excerpt: YoMo is an open-source Streaming Serverless Framework for building low-latency edge computing applications. Built atop QUIC transport protocol and functional reactive programming interface, it makes real-time data processing reliable, secure, and easy.
nodes.title: YoMo - A serverless framework for latency sensitive applications
nodes.author: YonaCao

nodes.excerpt: Directual is the only no-code platform that combines the flexibility, scalability, and security of traditional coding, with a modern, visual development approach. You can build scalable, secure and sophisticated apps with Directual.
nodes.title: Directual - Power of Coding in No-code format
nodes.author: Pavel Ershov
